wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Boyle (10 January 1859 – 19 August 1925) was an Irish Parliamentary Party politician. He was elected at the January 1910 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for North Mayo, and held the seat until his defeat at the 1918 general election by the Sinn Féin candidate, Dr John Crowley.

response: *Daniel Boyle (politician) (1859–1925), Irish politician, MP for North Mayo
